official_title: A bill entitled: "Final Regulations Mortgage Insurance for Public Hospitals".

summary.text: Directs: (1) the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to issue certain final regulations by December 31, 1985, relating to mortgage insurance for public hospitals; and (2) that if such regulations are not promulgated by such date, applications of public facilities shall be approved under regulations currently applicable to nonpublic facilities.

titles.title: A bill entitled: "Final Regulations Mortgage Insurance for Public Hospitals".
